alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 29 at 2:37AM MST until November 29 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CST /9 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 80 mph. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 PM CST /9 PM MST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
